Verses: 1 vaanangale, Sevikodungal, Naan Pesuven; Boomiye, En Vaaimozhigalaik Ketpaayaaga.
2 mazhaiyaanadhu Ilampayirinmel Pozhivadhupola, En Ubadhesam Pozhiyum; Paniththuligal Pullinmel Iranguvadhupola, En Vasanam Irangum.
3 karththarudaiya Naamaththai Pirasiththampannuven; Nammudaiya Dhevanukku Magaththuvaththaich Seluththungal.
4 avar Kanmalai; Avar Kiriyai Uththamamaanadhu; Avar Vazhigalellaam Niyaayam, Avar Niyaayakkedillaadha Saththiyamulla Dhevan; Avar Needhiyum Semmaiyumaanavar.
5 avargalo Thangalaik Keduththukkondaargal, Avargal Avarudaiya Pillaigal Alla; Idhuve Avargal Kaariyam; Avargal Maarupaadum Thaarumaarumulla Sandhadhiyaar.
6 vivegamillaadha Madhiketta Janangale, Ippadiyaa Karththarukkup Badhilalikkireergal. Unnai Aatkondapidhaa Avarallavaa? Unnai Undaakki Unnai Nilaippaduththinavar Avarallavaa?
7 poorvanaatkalai Ninai; Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaaich Sendra Varushangalaik Gavaniththuppaar; Un Thagappanaik Kel, Avan Unakku Arivippaan; Un Mooppargalaik Kel, Avargal Unakkuch Solluvaargal.

8 unnadhamaanavar Jaadhigalukkuch Sudhandharangalaip Pangittu, Aadhaamin Puththirarai Vevveraaip Piriththagaalaththil, Isravel Puththirarudaiya Thogaikkuththakkadhaai, Sarvajanangalin Ellaigalaith Thittampanninaar.
9 karththarudaiya Janame Avarudaiya Pangu; Yaakkobu Avarudaiya Sudhandharaveedham.

10 paazhaana Nilaththilum Oolaiyitudhalulla Verumaiyaana Avaandhara Veliyilum Avar Avanaik Kandupidiththaar, Avanai Nadaththinaar, Avanai Unarththinaar, Avanaith Thamadhu Kanmaniyaippolak Kaaththarulinaar.
11 kazhugu Than Koottaik Kalaiththu, Than Kunjugalinmel Asaivaati, Than Settaigalai Viriththu, Avaigalai Eduththu, Avaigalaith Than Settaigalinmel Sumandhukondupogiradhupola,
12 karththar Oruvare Avanai Vazhi Nadaththinaar; Anniya Dhevan Avarode Irundhadhillai.

13 boomiyilulla Uyarndha Sthaanangalinmel Avanai Erivarappanninaar; Vayalil Vilaiyum Palanai Avanukkup Pusikkak Koduththaar; Kanmalaiyilulla Thenaiyum, Karpaaraiyilirundhu Vadiyum Enneyaiyum Avan Unnumbadi Seydhaar.

14 pasuvin Venneyaiyum, Aattin Paalaiyum, Paasaanil Meyum Aattukkuttigal Aattukkadaakkal Vellaattukkadaakkal Ivaigaludaiya Kozhuppaiyum, Kozhumaiyaana Kodhumaiyaiyum, Raththampondra Suyamaana Thiraatcharasaththaiyum Saappittaai.
15 yeshooran Kozhuththuppoi Udhaiththaan; Kozhuththu, Sdhooliththu, Ninam Thunninapodhu, Thannai Undaakkina Dhevanai Vittu, Than Ratchippin Kanmalaiyai Asattaipanninaan.
16 anniya Dhevargalaal Avarukku Erichchalai Moottinaargal; Aruvaruppaanavaigalinaal Avaraik Kobappaduththinaargal.
17 avargal Dhevanukkup Baliyidavillai; Thaangal Ariyaadhavaigalum, Thangal Pidhaakkal Bayappadaadhavaigalum, Noodhanamaaith Thondriya Pudhu Theyvangalumaagiya Peygalukke Baliyittaargal.
18 unnai Jenippiththa Kanmalaiyai Nee Ninaiyaamarponaai; Unnaip Petra Dhevanai Marandhaai.
19 karththar Adhaik Kandu, Thamadhu Kumaararum Thamadhu Kumaaraththigalum Thammaik Kobappaduththinadhinimiththam Manamadivaagi, Avargalaip Purakkaniththu:
20 en Mugaththai Avargalukku Maraippen; Avargaludaiya Mudivu Eppadiyirukkum Endru Paarppen; Avargal Magaa Maarupaadulla Sandhadhi; Unmaiyillaadha Pillaigal.

21 dheyvam Allaadhavaigalil Enakku Erichchalai Mootti, Thangal Maayaigalinaal Ennaik Kobappaduththinaargal; Aagaiyaal Madhikkappadaadha Janangalinaal Avargalukku Erichchalai Undaakki, Madhiketta Jaadhiyinaal Avargalaik Kobappaduththuven.
22 en Kobaththinaal Akkini Patrikkondadhu, Adhu Thaazhndha Naragamattum Eriyum; Adhu Boomiyaiyum Adhin Palanaiyum Azhiththu, Parvadhangalin Asthibaarangalai Vegappannum.
23 theengugalai Avargalmel Kuvippen; Ennudaiya Ampugalaiyellaam Avargalmel Pirayogippen.

24 avargal Pasiyinaal Vaadi, Eripandhamaana Ushnaththinaalum, Kodiya Vaadhaiyinaalum Maandupovaargal; Dhushtamirugangalin Parkalaiyum, Tharaiyil Oorum Paambugalin Vishaththaiyum Avargalukkul Anuppuven.
25 veliyile Pattayamum, Ulle Bayangaramum, Vaalibanaiyum Kanniyaiyum Kuzhandhaiyaiyum Naraiththa Kizhavanaiyum Azhikkum.
26 engal Kai Uyarndhadhendrum, Karththar Idhaiyellaam Seyyavillai Endrum Avargaludaiya Pagaignar Thappennangondu Solluvaargal Endru,
27 naan Saththuruvin Kurodhaththirku Anjaadhirundhenaanaal, Naan Avargalai Moolaikkumoolai Sidhara Adiththu, Manidharukkul Avargaludaiya Peyar Atruppogappannuven Endru Solliyiruppen.
28 avargal Yosanaiketta Jaadhi, Avargalukku Unarvu Illai.
29 avargal Gnaanamadaindhu, Idhai Unarndhu, Thangal Mudivaich Sindhiththukkondaal Nalamaayirukkum Endraar.
30 avargaludaiya Kanmalai Avargalai Virkaamalum, Karththar Avargalai Oppukkodaamalum Irundhaaraanaal, Oruvan Aayiramperaith Thuraththi, Iranduper Padhinaayiramperai Ottuvadheppadi?
31 thangal Kanmalai Nammudaiya Kanmalaiyaippol Alla Endru Nammudaiya Saththurukkale Theermaanikkiraargal.

32 avargaludaiya Thiraatsachchedi, Sodhomilum Gomoraa Nilangalilum Payiraana Thiraatsachchediyilum Thaazhndha Jaadhiyaayirukkiradhu, Avaigalin Pazhangal Pidhthum Avaigalin Kulaigal Kasappumaai Irukkiradhu.
33 avargaludaiya Thiraatcharasam Valusarppangalin Vishamum Viriyan Paambugalin Kodiya Vishamumaanadhu.
34 idhu Ennidaththil Vaiththuvaikkappattu, En Pokkishangalil Idhu Muththirai Podappattirukkiradhillaiyo?

35 pazhivaanguvadhum Padhilalippadhum Enakku Uriyadhu; Etrakaalaththil Avargaludaiya Kaal Thallaadum; Avargaludaiya Aabaththunaal Sameebamaayirukkiradhu; Avargalukku Neridum Kaariyangal Theeviriththu Varum.

36 karththar Thammudaiya Janangalai Niyaayantheerththu, Avargal Belanpoyitrendrum, Adaikkappattavargalaavadhu Vidudhalai Petravargalaavadhu Oruvarum Illaiyendrum Kaanumbodhu, Thammudaiya Oozhiyakkaararmel Paridhaabappaduvaar.
37 appozhudhu Avar: Avargal Baliyitta Baligalin Kozhuppaith Thindru, Paanabaligalin Thiraatcharasaththaikkudiththa Avargaludaiya Dheyvangalum Avargal Nambina Kanmalaiyum Enge?
38 avaigal Ezhundhu Ungalukkuch Sagaayampannina Ungalukku Maraividamaayirukkattum.

39 naan Naane Avar, Ennode Vere Dhevan Illai Enbadhai Ippozhudhu Paarungal; Naan Kollugiren, Naan Uyirppikkiren; Naan Kaayappaduththugiren, Naan Sosthappaduththugiren; En Kaikkuth Thappuvippaar Illai.
40 naan En Karaththai Vaanaththirkuneraaga Uyarththi, Naan Endrendraikkum Jeeviththirukkiravar Engiren.
41 minnum En Pattayaththai Naan Karukkaakki, En Kaiyaanadhu Niyaayaththaip Pidiththukkollumaanaal, En Saththurukkalidaththil Pazhivaangi, Ennaip Pagaikkiravargalukkup Padhilalippen.
42 kolaiyundum Siraippattum Ponavargaludaiya Raththaththaale En Ambugalai Verikollappannuven; En Pattayam Thalaivar Mudharkondu Sagala Saththurukkalin Maamsaththaiyum Patchikkum.

43 jaadhigale, Avarudaiya Janangalodekoodak Kalikoorungal; Avar Thamadhu Oozhiyakkaararin Raththaththirkup Pazhivaangi, Thammudaiya Saththurukkalukkup Badhilaliththu, Thamadhu Dhesaththinmelum Thamadhu Janangalinmelum Kirubaiyullavaraavaar.
44 moseyum Noonin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaavum Vandhu, Indhap Paattin Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Janangal Ketkaththakkadhaagach Sonnaargal.
45 mose Indha Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Isravelar Yaavarukkum Sollimudiththapinbu,

46 avargalai Nokki: Indha Niyaayappiramaana Vaarththaigalinbadiyellaam Ungal Pillaigal Seyyumbadi Gavanamaayirukka, Neengal Avargalukkuk Karpikkumbadi, Naan Indru Ungalukkusaatchiyaai Oppuvikkira Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Ungal Manadhile Vaiyungal.

47 idhu Ungalukku Viyarththamaana Kaariyam Allave; Idhu Ungal Jeevanaayirukkiradhu, Neengal Sudhandhariththukkollumbadi Yordhaanaik Kadandhupoich Serumdhesaththil Idhinaal Ungal Naatkalai Needikkappannuveergal Endraan.
48 andha Naaliledhaane Karththar Moseyai Nokki:

49 nee Erigovukku Edhiraana Movaap Dhesaththilulla Indha Apaareem Ennum Malaigalilirukkira Nebo Parvadhaththileri, Naan Isravel Sandhadhiyaarukkuk Kaaniyaatchiyaagak Kodukkum Kaanaan Dhesaththaip Paar;
50 neengal Seen Vanaandharaththilulla Kaadhesile Meripaavin Thanneer Sameebaththil Isravel Puththirarukkulle Ennaip Parisuththampannaamal, Avargal Naduve En Kattalaigalai Meerinadhinaale,
51 un Sagodharanaagiya Aaron Or Ennum Malaiyile Mariththu, Than Janaththaaridaththil Serkkappattadhupola Neeyum Erappogira Malaiyile Mariththu, Un Janaththaaridaththil Serkkappaduvaai.
52 naan Isravel Puththirarukkuk Kodukkappogira Edhireyirukkira Dhesaththai Nee Paarppaai; Aanaalum Adharkul Nee Piravesippadhillai Endraar.
